TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PopupWindow extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: This class represents a popup window that can be used to display an arbitrary view.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

.property instance bool IsAboveAnchor
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property IsAboveAnchor As Boolean
public: virtual property bool IsAboveAnchor { bool get(); };
member this.IsAboveAnchor : bool

Docs.summary: Indicates whether the popup is showing above (the y coordinate of the popup's bottom is less than the y coordinate of the anchor) or below the anchor view (the y coordinate of the popup is greater than y coordinate of the anchor's bottom).
Docs.value: True if this popup is showing above the anchor view, false otherwise.
